H0.text: Hippocampus is the Latin name for which emblematic marine creature. Dolphin

H1.text: Hippocampus is the Latin name for which emblematic marine creature. Manatee

H2.text: Hippocampus is the Latin name for which emblematic marine creature. Walrus

H3.text: Hippocampus is the Latin name for which emblematic marine creature. Seahorse

A4.text: A seahorse (also written sea-horse and sea horse) is any of 46 species of small marine bony fish in the genus Hippocampus.

A5.text: Two species live in the Mediterranean Sea: H. guttulatus (the long-snouted seahorse), and H. hippocampus (the short-snouted seahorse).
